title: Dustbins in the sky
creator_credit: Mike Lockey, Bob Thorpe and London Television Service
brief_description: Made for the television program “Perspective”, this documentary examined the growth of technology in the collection, transmission and dissemination of news, from early cinema newsreels to today’s satellite coverage.
